description:
Earn World Glory At The Pinnacle Of Cricket!

Cricket 19 – The Official Game of the 2019 Ashes, is the complete cricket simulation. From Big Ant Studios, the leading name in authentic, realistic cricket simulation, comes this year’s tie-in to the mammoth summer of cricket in England. 

Select a team and lead them to T20, ODI or Test Match glory, or create your own team via the acclaimed Cricket Academy and recreate your local matches – Cricket 19 – The Official Game of the 2019 Ashes, has it all.

Dive into the deepest, story-driven career mode in the history of cricket video games. Build a rookie player’s career from their junior years at club cricket. Perform well and the headlines will be singing your praises, and before you know it, you’ll be leading your nation on to the field.

Key features include:
Deep player, stadia, logo and scenario creator.
Full support for all formats of cricket - T20, ODI and Test Match.
Real world AI and tactics.
Fully licensed Australian and English teams.
name: Cricket 19
